about.name: Denver
about.info_text: Denver, also known as the Mile-High City, is the capital of Colorado and a vibrant metropolis located in the western United States. The city is renowned for its stunning mountain views, outdoor recreational opportunities, and a thriving cultural scene. Nestled in the Rocky Mountains, Denver offers a mix of urban sophistication and natural beauty, making it a sought-after destination for both residents and visitors. With a rich history, diverse neighborhoods, and a strong focus on sustainability, Denver has something to offer everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 728,000
State: Colorado
Time Zone: Mountain Time Zone (UTC-07:00)
Language: English
Currency: United States Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Denver has a semi-arid climate, characterized by sunny days, low humidity, and relatively mild temperatures. The city experiences four distinct seasons, making it an ideal destination for outdoor activities year-round.

attractions_card.title: Red Rocks Amphitheatre
attractions_card.description: Red Rocks Amphitheatre is a world-famous outdoor concert venue located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains. It is known for its stunning natural acoustics and breathtaking surroundings.

attractions_card.title: Denver Art Museum
attractions_card.description: The Denver Art Museum is a renowned cultural institution featuring an extensive collection of art, from American Indian to contemporary, and impressive architecture.

attractions_card.title: Denver Botanic Gardens
attractions_card.description: The Denver Botanic Gardens is a lush oasis in the city, showcasing a wide variety of plants and themed gardens, as well as hosting art exhibitions.

attractions_card.title: Union Station
attractions_card.description: Denver Union Station is a historic transportation hub turned vibrant gathering place. It features restaurants, bars, and boutiques, making it a great place to explore.

attractions_card.title: Denver Zoo
attractions_card.description: The Denver Zoo is a family-friendly attraction with a diverse collection of animals and immersive exhibits, providing an educational and entertaining experience.

attractions_card.title: Mile High Stadium
attractions_card.description: Mile High Stadium, now known as Empower Field at Mile High, is the home of the Denver Broncos and a venue for sports enthusiasts to catch an NFL game.

attractions_card.title: Cherry Creek Shopping District
attractions_card.description: The Cherry Creek Shopping District is a premier retail and dining destination in Denver, offering upscale boutiques, galleries, and restaurants.

attractions_card.title: Denver Museum of Nature & Science
attractions_card.description: The Denver Museum of Nature & Science is an educational institution featuring fascinating exhibits on natural history, space, and anthropology.

food_card.title: Green Chile
food_card.description: Green chile is a regional specialty in Denver, often served over burritos, burgers, or as a topping for various dishes. It's a flavorful and spicy treat.

food_card.title: Rocky Mountain Oysters
food_card.description: Rocky Mountain oysters are a unique delicacy in Denver, consisting of deep-fried bull testicles. They are a curious culinary experience for the adventurous.

food_card.title: Craft Beer
food_card.description: Denver is known for its craft beer scene, with numerous local breweries producing a wide range of innovative and tasty beers for enthusiasts to enjoy.

food_card.title: Bison Steak
food_card.description: Bison steak is a lean and flavorful option for meat lovers. It's a popular choice in Denver due to the state's bison farming tradition.

food_card.title: Palisade Peaches
food_card.description: Palisade peaches are a sweet and juicy fruit grown in Colorado. They are highly regarded for their delicious flavor and are often used in desserts.

hotels_card.title: The Brown Palace Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Brown Palace is a historic and elegant hotel in the heart of Denver, known for its timeless charm, afternoon tea, and luxurious accommodations.

hotels_card.title: The ART, a Hotel
hotels_card.description: The ART is a modern boutique hotel featuring contemporary art installations and a sophisticated ambiance in Denver's Golden Triangle neighborhood.

hotels_card.title: The Maven Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Maven is a trendy hotel located in Denver's Dairy Block, offering stylish rooms, a lively social scene, and proximity to various attractions.

hotels_card.title: The Ritz-Carlton, Denver
hotels_card.description: The Ritz-Carlton in Denver provides a luxurious experience with elegant accommodations, a spa, and a prime downtown location.

transport_card.title: RTD Light Rail
transport_card.description: The Regional Transportation District (RTD) Light Rail system offers convenient public transportation throughout the Denver metro area.

transport_card.title: Denver B-cycle
transport_card.description: Denver B-cycle is a bike-sharing program, allowing residents and visitors to explore the city on two wheels through bike rentals at various stations.

transport_card.title: Denver International Airport
transport_card.description: Denver International Airport (DEN) is the primary airport serving the region, offering domestic and international flights and convenient ground transportation options.

transport_card.title: Rental Cars
transport_card.description: Denver has various rental car agencies, making it easy for travelers to access their own vehicles for exploring the city and its surroundings.
